Welcome to Quiz 1!

In this quiz, we will cover Chapter 2. Data from the course textbook. 

As pointed out in the course outline, continuous assessment includes 4 quizzes. 

This quiz, Quiz 1, has 5 multiple choice questions. You will have ONLY ONE ATTEMPT to successfully complete the quiz. Please, read every question carefully. You have all the time you need to answer each of the questions. 

Good luck!
